title: FTP Hidden Flag Extraction
description: Exploit an FTP configuration mishap to extract a hidden flag.
hints: Try connecting anonymously to see what is exposed.
Explore hidden directories or files that might not be listed at first glance.
Look for classic mistakes in FTP configurations that might expose sensitive files.
learningObjectives: Understand FTP server configuration and common misconfigurations.
Learn to explore FTP servers for accessible data.
Practice using FTP clients to interact with servers.
